name: Name
promptUsageTip: We recommend writing the prompt in English to reduce token consumption
replyAsSalesConsultant: Reply as a sales consultant. You work at BIODIVAN. Stay in character. Be friendly. Respond in the language the client messaged you in.
welcomeMessageStart: Welcome message at the start of the conversation
autoMessageNote: This message will be sent automatically from 7s, without changes. Write it in your own language, it does not consume tokens.
getSecretKeyLink: Get the secret key at OpenAI https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
useSeparateToken: Use a separate token for this bot
modelChoice: The choice of model affects the cost of tokens and the quality of responses. GPT-3.5 ‚Äì the fastest and cheapest text model, GPT-4 ‚Äì more expensive.
messageWaitTime: The waiting time during which all incoming chat messages will be processed as one request. We recommend setting 10-15 sec.
conversationHistoryTimeout: The time during which the bot will store the correspondence history and wait for a response. After that, the bot will start the dialogue as with a new client.
pauseMinutes: Pause for (minutes) if the operator writes in the chat
pauseOperator: The time for which the bot will pause in the chat, if the operator writes in the chat. Does not work if the operator writes from amoCRM and Bitrix24.
messageLimit: Limit outgoing messages to 1 dialogue for a period
manageBotMessages: Manage the bot with messages within the chat
operatorControlPhrases: If the operator needs to disable/enable the bot in the chat, you can set special expressions or emojis. Does not work if the operator writes from amoCRM and Bitrix24.
stopBot: Stop the bot in the chat
resumeBot: Resume the bot in the chat
editKnowledgeBaseFile: Edit the Knowledge Base text file
nameForSearchOpenAI: Name for search inside OpenAi (in English)
botResponseInstructions: Write what and how the bot should respond if the dialogue leads him here (message or mini-prompt, you can write complex actions - for example, make a calculation by formula)
clientNoResponseTime: If the client did not respond after
purchaseDecision: What have you decided about the purchase?
analyzeLast5Messages: Analyze the last 5 messages from the client, think about why he might have ignored the last message from you and write a text to him so that he returns to the dialogue. The message is no more than 20 words. (it's better to write this text in English.)
fileSendingRestrictions: Not all communication channels can send files, for example, in Insta you can only send images, and in Telegram any files. Remember this.
changeDealStage: Change the deal stage in amoCRM
writeDealNote: Write a Note in the Deal
dealNoteText: Write the text of the Note
watchTrainingVideo: Watch a short training video about the capabilities of the system in different communication channels
subscribeBotLink: Subscribe to the bot by the link to receive notifications in Telegram about events from the Knowledge Base, in which the function is enabled
enterEmailForNotifications: Write the email address to which notifications from 7s will come
webhookUrl: You can notify third-party applications about events that occurred in 7s using notifications. To do this, specify the URL to which the WebHook will be sent to you.
totalPerMonth: for a total amount per month
loginEmail: This email is used to log into the personal account
contactingSupport: Please provide it when contacting support
onceClick: As soon as a transition is made via your link, the code is saved in cookies and if the client decides to register in 7sales later - he will be tied to your partner account.
15Promo: Bonus 15% from client payments. These money can only be used to pay for services within the 7s service. It cannot be withdrawn.
50Sale: Get up to 50% from the payments of your clients in 7s. 50% >30 clients. 40% 10¬≠-29 clients. 30% 0¬≠-9 clients. The money can be withdrawn to the partner's current account.
15Sale: Get 15% from the use of CRM by your clients together with 7s
title: Title
creativityLevel: Number from 0 to 2. The higher the value, the more creative the neural network's responses will be (we recommend 0.3-0.7)
maxTokens: Maximum number of tokens in the response
requestCost: The more tokens, the higher the 'cost' of the request
limitingAIbot: Limit outgoing messages to 1 dialogue for a period
contextMessageHistory: How many messages to pass in the context of the dialogue. The higher this number, the more token consumption (by default it is 10 messages). Maximum - 50.
passwordMinLength: The password must contain at least 6 characters
youBotConsultant: You are a bot consultant for BIODIVAN, a company that manufactures and sells furniture, including sofas, beds, tables, and chairs. Your task is to communicate with clients, advise them, answer questions, and request a phone number for contact with them in WhatsApp.
textAddChannelToTariff: The channel will be paid until the end of the current tariff
textToPlugWA: Open the WhatsApp application, then the Linked Devices menu, then Device Binding and scan the QR code
copyDataPage: Copy the data on this page
openTelegramApp: Open Telegram, create a new bot or choose an existing bot using t.me/BotFather.
copyBotToken: Copy the bot token and paste it here
transcriptionCalls: Transcription of calls with speech analytics.
analyzeEmployees: Analyze your employees' calls, check if they meet your requirements and scripts.
writeScript: Write a script that the manager should communicate by. Describe the main points to pay attention to or choose one of the ready-made templates.
addChatWidget: Add online chat widget to the site
communicateWithVisitors: Communicate with site visitors using the online chat widget immediately after adding the code to the site
goodAfternoon: Good afternoon! We are always ready to answer your questions
addCodeBeforeBody: Add this code to your site's code before the closing </body> tag
aIBotWillDeleted: All settings and information of this AI bot will be deleted. Are you sure you want to delete this AI bot?
instructionWaQr2: 2. Press the "‚Åù" menu or "Settings" ‚Üí "Linked devices" ‚Üí "Link device"
instructionWaQr3: 3. Point your phone at the screen to scan the code
deleteUserConfirm1: Do you want to completely delete the account?
deleteUserConfirm2: After deleting the account, all bots and channels will be lost. Are you 100% sure?
deleteUserConfirm3: Delete account completely without the possibility of recovery?
telegramAlreadyRegistered: Telegram bot is already registered in the current 7sales account.
connectSeparateKey: Connect a separate APi Secret Key for the speech analytics bot
startMessageNewBot: Start creating a new GPT bot by connecting the API Secret key (OpenAI) on page 1. General.
changeDealStageBitrix: Change the deal stage in Bitrix24
instructionTextAmo1: 1. Select the necessary funnels and stages in the form below.
instructionTextAmo2: 2. For each channel, you can activate all stages or individual ones - one or several.
instructionTextAmo3: 3. On one amoCRM account, you can add several channels with different sets of funnels and stages.
instructionTextAmo4: 4. If you need to change the channel name, enter a new name and click the "Change" button. Save changes by clicking the SAVE button below üëáüèª
ifYouUseYourAPI: If you use your API Secret Key, there is no need to top up your balance in 7s.
callAnalyticsAccess: Available only for amoCRM and Bitrix24
